ruleBookName: title@text##(\(|_|-|:|,|txt|》|最新|无弹窗|完整|全集|全文|免费|章节|免费|小说).*|《
ruleChapterList:
@css:div:matches(一页|下页) ul:last-of-type a||
div:matchesOwn(章节列表：):has(br)>a||
ul:matches(\d、|\d\.|第|分节|番外|\d{3,}|卷|\(.*\)) a||
dl:matches(\d、|\d\.|第|分节|番外|\d{3,}|卷|\(.*\)) a||
*:has(>*:has(>a:matches(\d、|\d\.|第|分节|番外|\d{3,}|卷|\(.*\)))):not(:has(div)) a||
a[href~=\d+/\d+/\d+\.]||
a[href~=\d+/\d+\.]||
a[href~=\d{4,}]
